entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
